channel.title: Docker on GK's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on GK's Blog

item.title: What are containers!!
item.description: “Have you ever come across people saying or found yourself saying, “It worked on my machine”? Well, Don’t say you never said it, you did.” “Of course, everyone does, when I want to transfer my project to a new machine, I usually fall into this trap. Don’t you say it too?” “Well, I was, but not these days.” “So what should we do to stop saying it, there’s any special Operating System Virtualization that works the same on every Machine?
